```{r} 
data <- readr::read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/m-clark/generalized-additive-models/master/data/pisasci2006.csv") |> 
    select(- Country) |> 
    rename(
        geral = Overall,
        interesse = Interest,
        explicação = Explain,
        apoio = Support,
        renda = Income,
        saude = Health,
        educacao = Edu,
        idh = HDI
    )
splits <- initial_split(data, prop = 0.65)
train <- training(splits)
test <- testing(splits)
```
